messages.content: TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.S. President Barack Obama meets with Republican congressional leaders. Obama discusses financial crisis in Puerto Rico, passage of Trans-Pacific Partnership. Obama also discusses the opioid epidemic, cancer research and criminal justice reform.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Mike Huckabee had less than 2 percent of the vote on Monday with 85 percent of precincts reporting. Huckabee won the Iowa caucuses in 2008.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Minnesota Governor Mark Dayton was treated for dehydration at Regions Hospital. Dayton collapsed on Sunday while speaking during an event in Woodbury, a St. Paul suburb. He is a member of the Minnesota DemocraticFarmerLabor Party.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

President Barack Obama to meet with House Speaker Paul Ryan and Senate Majority Leader Mitch McConnell. White House spokesman Josh Earnest said leaders will probably discuss the Trans-Pacific Partnership, earned income tax credit, and heroin addiction problem.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

The New York Times Editorial Board says Ohio Governor John Kasich is the only plausible choice in the race for the Republican nomination in the U.S. presidential election. The editorial board said that, while Kasich was an underdog, he had been capable of compromise and believes in the ability of government to improve lives.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.S. Secretary of State John Kerry said he could not comment on private email chains of his predecessor Hillary Clinton. Kerry said they were being withheld at the request of the U.N. intelligence community.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.S. Vice President Joe Biden phoned Cypriot President Nikos Anastasiades. Leaders also discussed talks held on Thursday by Greece, Israel and Cyprus. Biden also spoke with Israel Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu about the issue.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Seven email chains being withheld from public release for containing top secret material. State Department is scheduled to release another batch of emails from Clintons server on Friday. Clinton has been embroiled in a controversy about her use of a private server for government business.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
U.S. Vice President Joe Biden spoke by phone with Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu. The two leaders discussed ongoing efforts to improve Israel-Turkey relations.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
The two leaders will mark 15 years of cooperation through Plan Colombia. Plan Colombia is a joint effort to create a safer, more prosperous future.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

The Republican presidential debate held without front-runner Donald Trump attracted 12.5 million viewers. Trump boycotted the event after Fox News refused to yield to his demand that network anchor Megyn Kelly be replaced as a moderator.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Katie Beirne Fallon, Obama's top legislative affairs aide, is leaving the White House. She will be replaced by Amy Rosenbaum, a former aide to House Democratic Leader Nancy Pelosi.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Former Arkansas Governor Mike Huckabee said on Thursday he will attend an event for military veterans being organized by Donald Trump. Trump has vowed to skip Thursday nights Republican presidential debate hosted by Fox News.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Republican presidential candidate Rick Santorum plans to join party front-runner Donald Trump at a rally in Iowa. Santorum will participate in the so-called undercard debate for Republican presidential candidates with less support in the polls before going to the event.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.S. Treasury officials assessment that Russian President Vladimir Putin is corrupt best reflects the administrations view. Earlier this week, the BBC reported that Adam Szubin, acting Treasury secretary for terrorism and financial crimes, said in an interview the United States considers Putin corrupt.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Hillary Clinton calls on the Democratic National Committee to authorize an additional debate. She said she would like to see the campaigns of the other two candidates, Bernie Sanders and Martin OMalley, to agree to the new debate.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

The White House declined to comment on the latest so-called tax-inversion deal by a major U.S. company. Johnson Controls Inc announced on Monday a $16.5 billion deal to acquire Ireland-based peer Tyco International Plc.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
U.S. Senate Majority Leader Mitch McConnell said he was weighing options to help deal with Puerto Ricos fiscal crisis. McConnell did not commit to any legislative action.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

The U.S. government is committed to helping Flint, Michigan, succeed in fixing the problems. There are significant public health consequences to the contaminated-water crisis. A federal official from the Department of Health and Human Services is in Flint.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Bernie Sanders would not participate in a proposed debate next month in New Hampshire. The debate would not be sanctioned by the Democratic National Committee. Sanders does not want to participate in the debate on Feb. 4, five days before the state primary election.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Tony Perkins, president of the Family Research Council, backs Ted Cruz. Cruz and billionaire businessman Donald Trump are locked in a tight Republican race in Iowa. Both Trump and Cruz have worked hard to pick up support from Christian conservatives.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.S. Senate Armed Services Committee Chairman John McCain says he plans to introduce legislation. McCain wants to strike language included in a massive 2016 spending bill that eased a congressional ban on the use of Russian rocket engines. McCain vows to do everything in my power to ban future use of the engines.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Former New York governor suspended his own presidential bid in late December. Pataki said he plans to campaign for the 44-year-old senator from Florida.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Hillary Clinton would be happy to participate in an additional debate, a spokeswoman said. Clinton is campaigning in Iowa ahead of state caucuses there on Monday.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

The billionaire businessman made the comment at a news conference in Marshalltown, Iowa. Trump has been engaged in a public spat with Fox News since a debate last August. He said he was subject to unfair questioning by moderator Megyn Kelly.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
The two will meet privately in the Oval Office and there will be no formal agenda. Sanders is challenging former Secretary of State Hillary Clinton for the Democratic nomination.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.S. Supreme Courts upholds federal rule for electricity markets. Rule encouraged grid operators to pay large users to reduce consumption at peak times. White House: Decision allows us to continue realizing billions in annual savings.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Vice President Joe Biden and Turkish President Tayyip Erdogan discussed ways to deepen cooperation in the fight against Islamic State. Biden and Erdogan also talked about the importance of de-escalating recent tensions between Turkey and Iraq.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Argentine President Mauricio Macri said on Friday U.S. Republican presidential frontrunner Donald Trump was a very tough negotiator. Macri also told Reuters that Venezuela was not respecting human rights.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

The Clean Power Plan is the centerpiece of the Obama administrations strategy to combat climate change. The rule aims to lower carbon emissions from the countrys power plants to 32 percent below 2005 levels by 2030.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Atlantic City Mayor Don Guardian calls an emergency City Council meeting next week. State lawmakers have been pushing for a full takeover of city operations. Only city officials can file for bankruptcy, but the state must ultimately approve it.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Fox News Channel says it will join with Google to host the Republican presidential primary debate. Debate will incorporate real-time Google trends and data to determine questions for the candidates.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Martin Shkreli, former chief executive officer at Turing Pharmaceuticals, has invoked the Fifth Amendment, refusing to produce documents subpoenaed by the Senate Special Committee on Aging.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Janet Yellen will appear before the U.S. House of Representatives Financial Services Committee on Feb. 10. The head of the central bank last testified before the committee in July.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
U.S. Vice President Joe Biden and Greek Prime Minister Alexis Tsipras discussed Greeces economic reforms. The leaders agreed on the importance of moving forward as quickly as possible.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
President Barack Obama to meet with mayor of Flint, Michigan, on Tuesday. Obama ordered federal aid for state and local response efforts in Genesee County.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
We are confident that the policies will be upheld as lawful, White House spokeswoman Brandi Hoffine says.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Marco Rubio says the Federal Reserve should approach interest rate increases according to clear rules. The U.S. senator from Florida commented on Fed policy during a small news conference. Economic growth is the result of free enterprise, he said.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Iran has made important progress in its effort to implement the international agreement to curtail its nuclear program. But its actions must still be independently verified, the White House says. Iran will not receive sanctions relief until the IAEA confirms it has complied with the agreement.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

The White House says it will rely on international experts to ensure Iran is living up to its commitments to curtail its nuclear program. White House spokesman Josh Earnest says there is ample reason to distrust Iran.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
The U.S. territory is far behind on filing its audited statements. Puerto Ricos long-awaited audited 2014 fiscal statements are close to release.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
U.S. President Barack Obama and Jordans King Abdullah are meeting at Andrews Air Force Base. Obama and the U.S.-Jordanian ally were both at the military base before separate trips.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Bernie Sanders says he supports the bill because too much of the U.S. central banks business is conducted in secret. Requiring the Government Accountability Office to conduct a full and independent audit of the Fed each and every year.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

There is still a possibility of further North Korean provocations, including cyber terrorism, says South Korean president. China should play a key and proper role in response to North Koreas fourth nuclear test, Park Geun-hye says.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

South Korea is in discussion with China regarding a draft U.N. Security Resolution in response to North Koreas January 6 nuclear test. South Korean President Park Geun-hye said developing nuclear weapons would be breaking its promise with the world.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Democracy breaks down when average person feels their voice doesn't matter, Obama says. Too many Americans feel that way right now, he says. Rancor and suspicion between the parties has gotten worse instead of better, he adds.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
President Barack Obama says he is willing to work with Republican Speaker Paul Ryan on reforms to address poverty. Obama: Id welcome a serious discussion about strategies we can all support.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
President Barack Obama warns against overstating the fight against Islamic State militants. But he says his administration is focused on destroying the extremist group.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
U.S. President Donald Trump will host Norway s Prime Minister Erna Solberg in Washington next month. The two leaders will meet on Jan. 10 at the White House to talk about a range of topics.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
U.S. President Donald Trump will host Norway s Prime Minister Erna Solberg in Washington next month. The two leaders will meet on Jan. 10 at the White House to talk about a range of topics.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
The fire at the pipeline had been brought under control, Miftah Magariaf said. The force is tasked with guarding oilfields in eastern Libya.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

The pair were elevated to similar positions in the ruling ZANU-PF party on Saturday. Chiwenga retired from the military this month. His appointment was expected as a reward for leading a de facto coup in November.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
French President Emmanuel Macron called for a complete lifting of a blockade on Yemen. Macron expressed his strong concerns about the humanitarian catastrophe in Yemen.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Russian Foreign Minister Sergei Lavrov said the main part of the battle with Islamic State in Syria was over. He said the key task in Syria now was to destroy Jabhat al-Nusra, referring to the al Qaeda-linked group.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Japanese Foreign Minister Taro Kono said any attempt to revise Tokyo s 2015 agreement with South Korea over comfort women would be unacceptable. Kono s comment comes after his South Korean counterpart, Kang Kyung-wha, said the agreement failed to meet the needs of victims.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Brazil will declare Venezuela s charg  d affaires persona non-grata. Move follows Venezuela s expulsion of Brazil s diplomatic envoy over the weekend.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Militant group Tahrir al Sham - a fighting force dominated by members of Al Qaeda s former branch in Syria - said it hit the plane. Source said the militants were searching for another pilot they believed had survived the crash.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Russian Foreign Minister Sergei Lavrov spoke to U.S. Secretary of State Rex Tillerson. The two men discussed further steps towards resolving the Syrian crisis and the situation in Ukraine.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

The accused were government employees with positions at important institutions. Clip has circulated on social media showing the crown prince jabbing his finger at dignitaries. It was not immediately clear if that video was the subject of the legal charges.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
The timing of the next meeting between Russian President Vladimir Putin and U.S. President Donald Trump has not yet been discussed, Russian Foreign Minister Sergei Lavrov says.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Migrant arrivals to Italy have fallen by two-thirds year on year since July. Officials working for the U.N.-backed government in Tripoli put pressure on people smugglers. Italy is also bolstering the Libyan coast guard s ability to turn back boats.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Feminist group Femen says the woman is a sextremist. She jumped over guard rails and rushed onto the Nativity scene. A Vatican gendarme stopped her from taking the statue and she was detained.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Nigeria s military has repelled an attack on Monday by suspected Boko Haram militants. The situation is now under control, Major General Nicholas Rogers said.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Tunisia suspends flights from Dubai carrier Emirates to Tunis. Officials say airline was refusing to carry female Tunisian travelers. Emirates has given no reason for not allowing female Tunisians to board its flights.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Two soldiers killed in attack by Kurdistan Workers Party (PKK) militants. Troops were carrying out security operations in the southeastern province of Hakkari. Separately, one soldier was killed and two others were wounded in northern Iraq.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Russian Foreign Minister Sergei Lavrov called on Monday for the United States and North Korea to start negotiations. Lavrov was cited as saying that Russia was ready to facilitate such negotiations. Moscow has long called for Washington and Pyongyang to hold talks.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Peruvian President Pedro Pablo Kuczynski pardoned former authoritarian leader Alberto Fujimori late on Sunday. Medical review showed former leader suffered from a progressive, degenerative and incurable disease. pardon comes just days after a faction of FujIMori s supporters in the opposition-controlled Congress saved Kuczy from a motion to oust him.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Islamic State claims responsibility for an explosion near a compound of Afghanistan s national intelligence agency. The blast, close to the entrance of the security agency compound, killed at least three.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Three workers, two of them Sudanese, died in an accident at Libya s Zelten oil and gas field. They died after inhaling gas during maintenance works, an oil source said. A fourth person was being treated in hospital.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
The countries hope gradually to increase bilateral trade ties. Sudan s economy has been struggling since the south seceded in 2011. In recent years, Turkey has boosted investments in Sudan.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Prime Minister Binali Yildirim said Turkey would employ an additional 110,000 public servants in 2018. He said that among the total, the government would hire an extra 36,000 medical personnel and 20,000 teachers.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

The fire broke out on Saturday at a furniture store on the mall s third level. It quickly engulfed an outsourcing business on the upper floor. Six people were rescued and taken to hospital. The cause was not known but an investigation was being launched.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

London Zoo reopens a day after a fire that killed an aardvark and likely four meerkats. The Zoo said an initial post mortem showed the aardVark named Misha most likely died from smoke inhalation whilst sleeping. The zoo, which dates from 1826, said it was too soon to speculate on the cause of the fire.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Around 500 people, including 170 children and women, need urgent humanitarian aid. Ankara aims to bring people in need of assistance to Turkey to provide treatment and care. In November, the U.N. humanitarian adviser for Syria called the situation a humanitarian emergency.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Russia maintains contacts with U.S. acting Assistant Secretary of State Alice Wells. Zamir Kabulov is special representative to the Russian president on Afghanistan.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Honduran opposition candidate Salvador Nasralla says his bid for the presidency is a lost cause. The United States recognized President Juan Orlando Hernandez as winner of the election.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Ukrainian President Petro Poroshenko has submitted a new draft law for an anti-corruption court. Slow progress establishing an independent court has been one of the main obstacles to the disbursement of loans under a $17.5 billion aid-for-reforms program.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Henrietta Fore will succeed Anthony Lake, U.N. secretary-general says. Fore was administrator of U.S. Agency for International Development from 2006 to 2009. She also served as undersecretary for management at the State Department.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Spanish Prime Minister Mariano Rajoy rules out calling a national election. Rajoy had gambled on unionist parties taking control of Catalonia s regional government. He sacked the Catalan government in October for illegally pursuing independence.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Danish police charge a 30-year-old Syrian man with attempting to commit a terrorist act. The man, whose name media are prohibited from mentioning, was arrested on Thursday. The court found there was reasonable suspicion the man had planned a terrorism attack.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Brazil's President Michel Temer warns of economic volatility and loss of international credibility. Temer acknowledged that corruption accusations had undermined his popularity. He said his government would not support a candidate in the 2018 presidential elections.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.N. Syria envoy Staffan de Mistura said Syria talks in the Kazakh capital Astana on Friday had agreed on a  working group for the release of detainees. He said it was a commendable first step towards an arrangement between the warring sides.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
U.N. ambassador says U.S. and Turkish troops should leave Syria immediately. Bashar al-Jaafari made the demand during Syrian peace talks in Astana, the capital of Kazakhstan.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
A total of 48,000 of Russian troops have taken part in Moscow s military campaign in Syria, Russian Defence Minister says.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Ugandan army on Friday attacked rebel camps in eastern Congo. Attack followed intelligence sharing with the Democratic Republic of the Congo.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Putin accuses U.S. of plotting to withdraw from Intermediate-range Nuclear Forces treaty. Treaty bans short and intermediate-range land-based nuclear and conventional missiles. Both Russia and the United States have accused each other of breaking the treaty.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Russian President Vladimir Putin and his Turkish counterpart Tayyip Erdogan spoke over the phone. They said they hoped the current round of Syria peace talks in Astana would lay the groundwork for a Syrian national dialogue congress.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Germany calls for reconciliation and respect for the constitution in Spain. Separatists triumphed in Catalan regional elections on Thursday. Result threatens to prolong political tensions there.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

London could not ignore Russia s meddling in elections around the world, Boris Johnson says. Johnson was speaking at a news conference in Moscow after holding talks with Russian Foreign Minister Sergei Lavrov.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Theresa May says Britain will take a hard headed approach to dealing with Russia. Foreign minister Boris Johnson and his Russian counterpart in Moscow on Friday.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Hungary sees a strong Poland as a vital component of a central European caucus. Orban said Poland, under fire from Brussels for its transformation of the judiciary, was being criticized unfairly and unjustly.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

A congresswoman says President Pedro Pablo Kuczynski promised some opposition lawmakers that he would pardon Alberto Fujimori. Cecilia Chacon, a lawmaker with the opposition party Popular Force, said the 10 abstentions by a faction in her party had helped defeat its bid to oust him. The government denied it was negotiating a possible pardon in exchange for votes to save him.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.S. President Donald Trump s new national security strategy unveiled this week. Trump said Washington had to deal with the challenge posed by North Korea s weapons programs. U.N. Security Council is due to vote on Friday on a U.S.-drafted resolution.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Passengers will be able to use laptops and tablets in aircraft cabins on flights from Riyadh and Jeddah starting from Dec.21. The United States and Britain implemented curbs on electronic items in the cabin in March.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Catalan separatist leader Carles Puigdemont was on track to regain the leadership of Spain's northeastern region. Preliminary results showed a coalition of secessionist parties winning a majority in regional elections. The separatist parties were seen getting a total of 70 seats in the 135-seat assembly.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

British police start to reopen roads around Buckingham Palace in London. All road closures are now in the process of being removed. Queen Elizabeth is not at Buckingham Palace as she travelled to her Sandringham estate.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Russian President Vladimir Putin s envoy for Syria says there is no reason for U.S. forces to remain in Syria. Alexander Lavrentiev was speaking in Astana, the capital of Kazakhstan, ahead of a new round of Syrian peace talks.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Russia is likely to maintain a big presence in Syria, Brett McGurk says. U.S. special envoy to the coalition fighting the Islamic State insurgent group.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Iranian foreign minister says vote was a clear international rejection of U.S. President Donald Trump's administration. Mohammad Javad Zarif:  A resounding global NO to Trump regime s thuggish intimidation at #UN.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
separatist parties seen getting 67-71 seats in the 135-seat assembly. No official results have yet been published and it was unclear if final results would match the poll.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Israel rejects the U.N. decision and is satisfied with the high number of countries that did not vote in its favour. Israel thanks U.S. President Trump for his unequivocal position in favour of Jerusalem.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Erdogan says he welcomed the overwhelming support for the resolution in the U.N. General Assembly. More than 100 countries voted in favor of calling for the United States to reverse its decision.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.N. members have shown dignity and sovereignty are not for sale, says Turkey's foreign minister. Foreign Minister Mevlut Cavusoglu also said that Turkey, Palestine and other co-sponsors thanked every country that supported the resolution.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

The United Arab Emirates charge d affaires was summoned to the ministry over comments about an Ottoman commander. Foreign Minister Sheikh Abdullah bin Zayed Al Nahayan retweeted on Saturday accusations that Ottoman forces stole goods from the holy city of Medina during World War One.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.N. special envoy on Syria Staffan de Mistura says he plans to organize next round of Syrian peace talks in Geneva. De Mistura was speaking in Moscow at a news conference after holding talks with Russian Foreign Minister Sergei Lavrov.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
France tells eastern Libyan military commander Khalifa Haftar he needs to respect the U.N. peace process. Foreign Minister Jean-Yves Le Drian: "I said there is no alternative"
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Britain and Poland are concerned about Russian attempts to weaponise information. The Kremlin is seeking to undermine the international rules-based system, May says.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Russian Foreign Ministry spokeswoman Maria Zakharova says decision to scale back British-Russian dialogue was a groundless and untimely decision by London. British foreign minister Boris Johnson will visit Moscow on Dec. 22 for talks with his Russian counterpart Sergei Lavrov.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

A 48-year-old man from Wales pleaded not guilty to terrorism-related murder and attempted murder. Darren Osborne allegedly drove a van at Muslims outside a mosque in Finsbury Park, London. One worshipper dead and 11 injured.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Russian military observers had to pull out of a joint ceasefire control group. Earlier this week, the ministry said it was recalling officers serving at the Joint Centre for Control and Coordination in Ukraine.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.S. allegations that Russia is breaking its Cold War-era Intermediate-Range Nuclear Forces Treaty with Washington lack evidence. Russian Foreign Ministry spokeswoman Maria Zakharova says allegations are speculative.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Syria s opposition is sabotaging the Geneva peace talks in a bid to ruin Russia s preparations for a planned congress of national dialogue in Syria, Russian Foreign Ministry spokeswoman says.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
The U.S. Treasury Department on Wednesday imposed the new sanctions on the five people. Moscow will hit back with tit-for-tat sanctions, a Russian Foreign Ministry spokeswoman said.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Suspicious package prompts evacuation of Christmas market in Frankfurt. Authorities say package was a donation for the homeless. All clear came about 45 minutes after the evacuation was announced.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Russia may designate any media as  foreign agents if they are financed by a foreign state or citizen. Russian President Vladimir Putin signed a law last month that allowed the authorities to designate foreign media outlets as foreign agents. Moscow said was unacceptable U.S. pressure on Russian media.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
There is no firm date yet for the much-discussed Syria peace congress, Kremlin spokesman says. No one wants  to artificially accelerate holding of the congress, Dmitry Peskov says.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Kremlin says approval by U.S. of export license for Ukraine to buy certain light weapons may provoke hotheads among Ukrainian nationalists. Russia says the move could spark new bloodshed in eastern Ukraine.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
A car was deliberately driven into pedestrians in the Australian city of Melbourne. Up to 14 people were injured, though the motive was not known, police said.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
